title: Welcome to IntraVox - Your Modern Intranet Platform

widgets.content: The ultimate intranet platform for modern organizations

IntraVox transforms how your team collaborates, communicates, and shares information. With an intuitive interface and powerful features, IntraVox provides everything you need for a successful digital workplace.

Flexible Page Editor

Create and manage beautiful pages with our user-friendly drag-and-drop editor. Add text, images, lists, and more without technical knowledge.

Multi-language Support

IntraVox supports multiple languages out-of-the-box. Switch seamlessly between Dutch, English, German, and French.

Team Folder Integration

Built-in integration with Nextcloud Team Folders ensures secure and organized file storage with granular access control.

Advanced Navigation

Choose between dropdown and megamenu navigation styles. Organize content up to 3 levels deep for optimal user experience.

Real-time Editing

Changes are automatically saved and immediately visible to your team. No complex publication workflows needed.

Responsive Design

Your intranet looks perfect on any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile.

1. Create pages with the intuitive editor
  2. Organize content with widgets and layouts
  3. Configure navigation to your needs
  4. Share knowledge and communicate effectively
Click the "Edit" button in the top right to modify this page. Use "+ New Page" to add more content. The possibilities are endless!
Built on Nextcloud with Vue.js for a modern, secure, and scalable experience.
